text_block_list.text: On a day right before the Selection Race…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: E-E-E-E-E-E-Emergency～～～～!!!!

School had ended for the day when a distressed 
Matikanefukukitaru burst into the room.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Daaaah～～ Trainer… What… What am I to dooooo～!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Guhuh… I just attempted to divine the outcome of the Selection Race.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: And would you know it… Terrible Luck～～～!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
This is awful! It's like Saturn returned, and with a party hat on! 
I simply have to address this somehow!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Big news, big news! We have a situation on our hands!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Ta… Taiki? It can't be anything good, but I shall 
ask you what is going on regardless……

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: The schedule for the Selection Race is up, and Fukukitaru's group is unbelievable!

As Taiki listed the group's entrants, each name 
drew more color from Matikanefukukitaru's face.

All of them were prominent horsegirls, all but guaranteed 
to be making their debuts…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Aaaaah～～ I'm done foooor～～! My Selection Race has ended before it even begaaan～!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Clearly, this is the very thing my divination tried to warn me of… Ohh, why did I even try so hard… boohoo…

Matikanefukukitaru was left entirely dejected, 
and her low spirits reflected in her training.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Nnnyininininiiiii～～～! Finiiished～!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Haah… haah… You need not bother telling me. I know the time was as dreadful as my running.
choice_data_list: Let's call it a day here then.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: …… Yes, that would be for the best.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Hueeh… It's true what they say, fate is already set in stone……

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I knew it all along… that I really don't have the ability 
to find happiness in the Twinkle Series.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
…… I have a sister, actually. A really incredible 
older sister to whom I've oft been compared.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Ah, don't get me wrong now, I don't bear any ill feelings! 
On the contrary, I respect her a lot!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: All the same, I end up comparing myself to her often as well…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Truth be told, I was incredibly unsure about applying 
to Tracen Academy, doubtful that someone like me 
would really be able to make it…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
That is precisely the moment when Divine Shiraoki descended 
upon my dreams and spoke the following ——

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Run, and you shall find a path opened to you.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
By putting my trust in her words, I was 
able to reach where I am now……
Hearing this, I was reminded of something she had said before.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
She always guides me to the right path whenever I feel 
lost and anxious, as she did after my race with Taiki.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
For me to even be here running is all thanks 
to my trust in her and the powers of divination. 
Truly, I am not worthy～

I don't know what to make of this Shiraoki entity, but the reality 
is that Matikanefukukitaru wants to run, and fortune-telling has 
always supported her in that.

Those mysterious forces are irreplaceable to her, and it's 
undeniable that she has made it this far through them. 
Given that, there's only one thing for me to do ——
choice_data_list: On second thought, let's continue training!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Huh…? But right now I am simply a girl, discarded by fortune. 
Regardless of how much I run, I cannot imagine the results 
to be positive…

Disheartened as she was, I still managed 
to convince her to return to training.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Bheeh… ghehh… It really is of no use. My body feels so heavy……

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Divination doesn't lie… my lot's exactly as terrible as predicted…
choice_data_list: <size=38>How much do you really trust in divination?</size>
<size=38>How much do you really trust in divination?</size>

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: What……? I have complete and utter trust in it, of course!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Nothing has shown me the way forward like divination has! 
It would be no mistake to call it the essence of my life!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
As such, it is not really even a matter of trust. 
Divination is my reality!
choice_data_list: Then your predestined one here is part of this reality?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
With all course in the world! You are one of my most fateful 
encounters, holding the power to change my future!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
The whole reason why I have persevered so long, 
aiming to show you my power at the Selection Race!
choice_data_list: <size=34>Then forget about results, and let me see you run.</size>
<size=34>Then forget about results, and let me see you run.</size>

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: You want to see me run… over results?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Ooo… ooooooooh!! 
Of course, yes! That's exactly it!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Even if the result is most terrible, what I must do 
at the Selection Race is to run with all my heart!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
With my goal being to have you officially 
accept me under your tutelage!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
If terrible my prospects will be, then let them be so! 
I shall make sure you see my ability nonetheless!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
With that settled, I will go run another lap! No matter who my 
opponents might be, I will face them with all I haaave～!

In this way, Matikanefukukitaru came 
to run towards the future once more.
